name: Castle Master + Castle Master II: The Crypt
description: A number of copies of Castle Master came with an additional exclusive game called The Crypt. It uses the same Freescape game engine and continues the original plot. In this chapter, you'll have to free your beloved by entering and exploring a 3D crypt, activating lifts and exploring the various floors.
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Commodore 64, DOS, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
